title: Spelling Co-Champs Beat The Bee, Leaving Judges Without Words
teaser: For the first time since 1962, there are co-champions at the Scripps National Spelling Bee. Teens Ansun Sujoe and Sriram Hathwar tied when the pair exhausted the official list of words.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
